sentences.en: Anaplasma ovis is an arthropod - borne rickettsial obligate parasite of sheep and goat.
sentences.cn: 绵羊无浆体病是绵羊和山羊红细胞内专性寄生的由节肢动物传播的立克氏体疾病.

sentences.en: And we are just the parasite of the self - images in ther mirror.
sentences.cn: 我们不过是镜里自己形象的寄生物.

sentences.en: Any object moving through air encounters parasite drag.
sentences.cn: 任何物体在空气中运动都会产生废阻.

sentences.en: Blastocystis hominis is an intestinal protozoan parasite restricted to humans and primates.
sentences.cn: 人芽囊原虫(Blastocystishominis, B. h)是一种存在于人类和其他灵长类动物体内的肠道寄生原虫.

sentences.en: Damage from the parasite is worst in dry soil with low fertility.
sentences.cn: 干旱贫瘠的土地里,这种寄生物所造成的破坏是最严重的.

sentences.en: Kangaroos harbour a vast range of parasites.
sentences.cn: 袋鼠身上有各种各样的寄生虫。

sentences.en: Missed toll Mistletoe is apperent site a parasite plant.
The host is not always injured by association with a parasite.
sentences.cn: 主人与食客结交并不一定会吃亏.

sentences.en: The mistletoe plant is a parasite on trees.
sentences.cn: 槲寄生是寄生于树上的植物.

sentences.en: The parasite population opposing vertical resistance may undergo stepwise development controlled by many genes.
sentences.cn: 抵抗垂直抗性的寄生物种群可能要经历许多基因控制的步增发育.

sentences.en: The relationship between host and parasite can be disarranged in many ways.
sentences.cn: 可以用许多方法破坏寄生和寄生物之间的相互关系.

sentences.en: The term pathogenicity denotes the ability of a parasite to cause disease.
sentences.cn: 致病性这一术语是指寄生物引起疾病的能力.

sentences.en: The traditional Christmas mistletoe is native to Europe a parasite plant.
sentences.cn: 传统的圣诞槲寄生从本地流畅到欧洲.

sentences.en: There are two kinds of drags, parasite drag and induced drag.
sentences.cn: 阻力有两种:寄生阻力和诱导阻力.

sentences.en: There is the potential of uptake of soil, inorganic nitrogen by the roots of the semi - parasite.
sentences.cn: 半 寄生的根系有可能吸取土壤的无机氮.

sentences.en: Uninfected mosquitoes become infected with the parasite by biting infected animals.
sentences.cn: 未被感染的蚊子也通过叮咬被感染疟疾的动物而被感染.

words.tran_cn: 吸血动物,寄生虫,寄生菌,寄生植物
榨取他人利益者,附属物,仆从,势利小人,爪牙,走狗,谄媚者,马屁精,趋炎附势者

trans.tran_cn: 寄生物，寄生虫，食客，寄生植物，天线反射器
trans.tran_en: a plant or animal that lives on or in another plant or animal and gets food from it
